pro remove_night cd,current=cdir ;folder = 'Z:\DIMITRI_code\DIMITRI_2.0\Input\Site_Libya\AATSR\Proc_2nd_Reprocessing\2010' folder = '/mnt/Projects/MEREMSII/temp_data/' ;folder = 'R:\MEREMSII\temp_data_spg\' cd,folder res = file_search('*.N1') for i=0l,n_elements(res)-1 do begin val = strmid(res[i],23,1) if val eq '0' then file_delete,res[i] endfor cd=cdir end
